post.author: 김태희
post.content:
ate Posted: March 10, 2010
Job ID: 11702        

Job Description

Our downtown Toronto based client is currently seeking one (1) Java Web Developer. This is a contract opportunity slated to begin immediately, and is projected to be six (6) months in length with the possibility of extending.

Key Responsibilities

The successful candidate will be responsible for:

Performing analysis, design, programming and testing, based on SDLC methodology;
Providing after-hours support of production systems when required;
Working closely with senior Developers/Architects on the application design;
Working closely with Project Manager and providing input on project timelines;
Working closely with Business Analyst to translate business requirements into technical solutions;
Technically implementing small, medium and large sized systems development projects;
Applying analytical skills for problem solving and resolution;
Conducting and participating in code reviews;
Participating in knowledge transfer with the team; and,
Keeping up-to-date with latest industry standards.
Skills and Qualifications

The qualified candidate must have:

Five to eight (5 – 8) years of Java development experience;
Knowledge of Java technologies: J2SE, J2EE, JSP, Servlets, JDBC;
Knowledge of other technologies: SQL, HTML, XML, CSS , OpenSSO;
Experience with Java frameworks (SPRING, Struts 2, Hibernate, IBATIS);
Knowledge of infrastructure and network technologies;
Experience with BPM and Workflow engines;
Experience with development tools: Ant, Apache, Tomcat, CVS;
Experience with development and development platforms: Windows, Linux;
RDBMS knowledge: SQL Server, DB2;
Experience working with XML and XSLT;
Experience with Java Design Patterns;
Experience with Web application development;
Experience with Web page design;
Knowledge of applied software development principles and methodologies;
Strong research skills and analytical ability; and,
Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

Don't miss out on this opportunity, apply on-line today!

We thank all applicants for their interest; however, only candidates under consideration will be contacted.  Please note that your application does not signify the beginning of employment with Eagle and that employment with Eagle will only commence when placed on an assignment as a temporary employee of Eagle.
post.title: Java web Developer(Agent)
